title: Hopes Ride On California Chrome, As Colt Bears Down On Triple Crown
teaser: The third jewel in horse racing's Triple Crown will be run Saturday at the Belmont Stakes. Sportswriter Stefan Fatsis joins Audie Cornish to talk about California Chrome's chance to become the first horse to win all three races since 1978.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
